bug.short_desc: manage JIRA RPC Services API requests

long_desc.thetext: This bug report is used to track enhancement requests against the JIRA RPC plugin that are required to support JIRA features in Mylyn. The corresponding JIRA report on jira.atlassian.com is linked from the URL field.

From bug 213397:
Exception occurred: com.atlassian.jira.exception.DataAccessException: com.atlassian.jira.issue.customfields.impl.FieldValidationException: Invalid date format. Please enter the date in the format "d/MMM/yy".
The exception should include the id/name of the custom field that was not formatted correctly.

From bug bug 221965:
Please note that it is unsafe to format days and weeks because actual values depends on the server side settings, such as how many work hours is included in a day and how many days work week has. Without getting those settings from the server such formatting can result in a misleading results.
The repository should provide a user accessible API to determine the actual configuration.

(In reply to comment #2) > The repository should provide a user accessible API to determine the actual > configuration.
Am I missing something? There is already API for retrieving this info

The problem is I get a RemotePermissionException when executing the call you suggested on bug 215109 unless I have administrative permissions for the repository. Since most users will only have limited permissions on the repository I wrote "user accessible" API.

Bug in the RPC service that affects Mylyn:
JRA-18529: web request for XML returns a gzip but HTTP header is set to text/html http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/JRA-18529

The Mylyn JIRA Connector has moved to Atlassian. All unresolved Mylyn bugs assigned to the JIRA component, which includes this bug, have been copied to https://studio.atlassian.com/browse/PLE and marked as resolved on bugs.eclipse.org. The new location of this bug report can be found in the URL field.
Please see this FAQ entry for further details: http://wiki.eclipse.org/Mylyn/FAQ#What_happened_to_the_Mylyn_JIRA_Connector.3F .
